binaryProperty.hint: The name of the output binary field to put the file in

conditional_rules: IF resource == 'presentation' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'title'
IF resource IN ["presentation", "page"] AND operation IN ["get", "getThumbnail", "getSlides", "replaceText"] THEN SHOW parameter 'presentationId'
IF operation == 'getSlides' AND resource == 'presentation' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF operation == 'getSlides' AND resource == 'presentation' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'page' AND operation IN ["get", "getThumbnail"] THEN SHOW parameter 'pageObjectId'
IF resource == 'presentation' AND operation == 'replaceText' THEN SHOW parameter 'textUi'
IF operation == 'replaceText' AND resource == 'presentation' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'page' AND operation == 'getThumbnail' THEN SHOW parameter 'download'
IF resource == 'page' AND operation == 'getThumbnail' AND download == True THEN SHOW parameter 'binaryProperty'
